author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Please add (at least)
```
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot.
Also, just quickly skimming through the code, I am not sure how you are supposed to use this as a package, it only proviedes a hello world function?

> Please add (at least)
> ```
> [compat]
> julia = "1"
> ```
> to your project file and retrigger the bot.

Added, wondering how to retrigger the bot?

> Also, just quickly skimming through the code, I am not sure how you are supposed to use this as a package, it only proviedes a hello world function?

Yes, it's very much a placeholder now and finalising some more substantial functionality now which I'll commit shortly.

> Added, wondering how to retrigger the bot?

You just redo what you did when you first submitted this PR.

> Yes, it's very much a placeholder now and finalising some more substantial functionality now which I'll commit shortly.

Okay. Do you still want it merged? Registering a package is really only for making it more convenient for other users to use the package, but if this is not ready just yet, maybe wait? Let me know what you prefer.

body:
- Registering package: Toybox
